metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38614 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Polipo through 1.1.1, when NDEBUG is used, allows a heap-based buffer overflow during parsing of a Range header. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

criterions.comment: polipo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
